text: Józefa Franciszka Joteyko (29 January 1866 – 24 April 1928) was a Polish medical doctor, physiologist, psychologist, pedagogist, and co-organizer of special education in Warsaw. She was born on January, 29, 1866, in Poczujki and died on April, 24, 1928, in Warsaw. == References == Category:1866 births Category:1928 deaths Category:Polish psychologists Category:Polish academics Category:Polish physicians Category:Physiologists Category:Scientists from Warsaw Category:Special education
title: Józefa Joteyko
